voicePlay.title: Play Steel Darts without typing
voicePlay.slogan: Stay in flow and improve your game.

faqs.question: Does VoicePlay work in noisy environments?
faqs.answer: VoicePlay was developed for quiet to silent environments, especially for practicing. Please note that using it in loud environments, especially with multiple people speaking simultaneously, may lead to instability and is at your own risk.

faqs.question: How can I play in a noisy environment? (not recommended)
faqs.answer: You can try disabling auto-commit, configuring VoicePlay to require separate confirmation for each command.

faqs.question: Does VoicePlay work without an internet connection?
How many devices can I use with my subscription?
faqs.answer: A subscription is bound to ONE device at a time. If you sign in on a new device, you'll be automatically logged out from the previous one.

faqs.question: Have questions about billing or need assistance with payment?
faqs.answer: For billing inquiries and assistance with payments, please visit our dedicated [Discord channel](https://discord.com/channels/1177282736935940127/1177285970429755462).

faqs.question: Experiencing technical issues or want to report a bug?
faqs.answer: For technical support and bug reporting, please visit our dedicated [Discord channel](https://discord.com/channels/1177282736935940127/1177288347530563655).

footer.slogan: Perfect your game while DartSense handles counting.
